vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.8.18;
father of: Benaiah (H1141)
§ Jehoiada = "Jehovah knows"
1) father of Benaiah, David's mighty warrior
2) leader of the priests who joined David at Hebron
3) high priest at the time of Athaliah's usurpation of the throne of Judah; hid Joash, the king's son, for six years and eventually replaced him on the throne of Judah
4) second priest, or sagan, to Seraiah the high priest
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Benaías, guerrero, más tarde jefe del ejército de Salomón; (b)   sacerdote; en tiempos de la reina Atalía y el rey Joás de Judá; (c) יוֹיָדָע   hijo de Eliasib; sumo sacerdote; post exílico; (d)   sacerdote; en tiempos del profeta Jeremías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶何耶大 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華知曉"
1) 比拿雅的父親, 大衛王的勇士之一
2) 亞他利雅篡奪猶大王權時為祭司; 在亞他利雅剿滅猶大王室的行動中將王子
約阿施藏了起來, 六年之後將約阿扶正, 登上猶大王位
3) 耶利米時代的一名祭司 #耶 29:26|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶何耶大 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华知晓"
1) 比拿雅的父亲, 大卫王的勇士之一
2) 亚他利雅篡夺犹大王权时为祭司; 在亚他利雅剿灭犹大王室的行动中将王子
约阿施藏了起来, 六年之后将约阿扶正, 登上犹大王位
3) 耶利米时代的一名祭司 #耶 29:26|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.11.4; married to Jehosheba (H3089);
father of: Zechariah (H2148w); also called Barachiah (KJV: Barachias; NIV: Berekiah) at Mat.23.35;
Also named: Barachias<\i> (Βαραχίας "Barachiah" G0914)
§ Jehoiada = "Jehovah knows"
1) father of Benaiah, David's mighty warrior
2) leader of the priests who joined David at Hebron
3) high priest at the time of Athaliah's usurpation of the throne of Judah; hid Joash, the king's son, for six years and eventually replaced him on the throne of Judah
4) second priest, or sagan, to Seraiah the high priest

3) high priest at the time of Athaliah's usurpation of the throne of Judah; hid Joash, the king's son, for six years and eventually replaced him on the throne of Judah
4) second priest, or sagan, to Seraiah the high priest
